about.title: Game: Colors
about.descr: Benefit: Develops cognitive flexibility, ability to make quick decisions, suppress automatic reactions (Stroop effect).
about.rule1: 1. Look at the word — it's written in different colors! Click on the card that matches the color of the text, not its value. 🎨
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! 🏆

about.title: Game: Numbers
about.descr: Benefit: Improves visual perception, trains the ability to focus on the desired object among many distracting elements.
about.rule1: 1. Find and click on the card where the number matches the number shown below. 😊
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! 🏆

about.title: Game: Math Sprint
about.descr: Benefit: Develops speed of information processing, improves arithmetic skills, and helps train the brain for quick calculations.
about.rule1: 1. Solve the example and click on the card with the correct answer. 😊
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! 🏆

about.title: Game: Tongue Twisters
about.rule1: 1. You have 5 seconds to correctly pronounce the tongue twister. ⏳
about.rule2: 2. You get a point for each correctly pronounced tongue twister. Score resets on error! 🏆

about.title: Game: Sequence
about.descr: Benefit: Trains memory, attention and reaction speed.
about.rule1: 1. Look carefully at the cards for 5 seconds and memorize their sequence. 👀
about.rule2: 2. After the cards disappear, you have 5 seconds to click them in the same order. ⏳
about.rule3: 3. You get a point for each correct sequence. Score resets on error! 🏆

antistress.title: Anti-stress
antistress.description: Breathing to reduce stress and anxiety

box.title: Box Breathing
box.description: Breathing with equal intervals to calm the nervous system

about.title: Game: Breath
about.descr: Benefit: Helps reduce stress and anxiety, improve concentration and sleep quality.
about.rule1: 1. Choose the type of breathing and start the training.
about.rule2: 2. Follow the instructions and perform the exercises.

about.title: Game: Minesweeper
about.descr: Benefit: Develops logical thinking, improves decision-making skills and attention to detail.
about.rule1: 1. Click on cells to reveal what's hidden underneath. Avoid mines! 💣
about.rule2: 2. Numbers show how many mines are in adjacent cells. 🔢
about.rule3: 3. Switch to Flag mode to mark cells where you think mines are. 🚩
about.rule4: 4. Clear all safe cells to win! Score resets on hitting a mine. 🏆

spelling.title: Find the word with a spelling mistake

about.title: Game: Spelling
about.descr: Benefit: Improves literacy, attention to detail, and develops visual memory for correct word spelling.
about.rule1: 1. Look at 4 words and find the one with a spelling mistake. 🔍
about.rule2: 2. You have 10 seconds to find and click on the incorrect word. ⏳
about.rule3: 3. You get a point for each correct answer. Score resets on error! 🏆

rules.title: Learn English Words
rules.description: Choose the correct English word that matches the Russian translation. You have 5 seconds for each word. Get 15 correct answers in a row to win!

about.title: Game: Vocabulary
about.descr: Benefit: Expands English vocabulary, improves word recognition and translation speed.
about.rule1: 1. Look at the Russian word and find its correct English translation among the cards. 📚
about.rule2: 2. You have 5 seconds to choose the correct translation. ⏳
about.rule3: 3. Get 15 correct answers in a row to win! Score resets on error. 🏆
